title: BoM News e6
description:
Thank you all for your support and encouragement BoM news team greatly appreciates you all

Randos United https://youtu.be/dXQyAjWNmio

  
Chris Petkau https://youtu.be/jkZPUFJYuR4

Paul VanderKlay
https://youtu.be/Pd9K0MJCXYI


John Vervaeke Friday Q&A
https://youtu.be/xSSiBR5N49E


Jordan Peterson Baron Black

If I’ve harmed you in any way please let me know. We’ll see if I can make it right. God bless.
